price: 179. Waxaa idiinku sugan nolol xeerka dhaawac simidda dadka wax garadkow, si aad u dhowrsataan.
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡقِصَاصِ حَيَوٰةٞ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walakum fī al-qiṣāṣi ḥayatun yāulī al-albābi laʿallakum tattaqūna
